初遇.encontent:
Good day! My name is Nick Bottom, the weaver in town.I've also
 acted in dramas. Let me play the lion. Let me play the hero
 ...  Ahaha, yes, yes, now I will but make an ass!
初遇.content:
您好，咱的名字叫做尼克·波顿，曾在城中做织匠。咱也
演过戏剧，咱能演狮子，也能演英雄——啊哈哈，是哟、是
哟，现在咱也只能演一只驴子啦！

箱中气候.encontent: A foggy day ... Does it also come from her magic?
箱中气候.content: 这天气……也是出自于她的手笔吗？

致未来.encontent: All shall be well, haha, Jack shall have Jill.
致未来.content: 有情人终成眷属，哈哈，有情人终成眷属。

孑立.encontent:
Oh oh! It's alright. I am very good at entertaining
 myself.
孑立.content: 噢噢！没关系。咱很擅长自娱自乐。

朝晨.encontent: Planer, saw, needle and thread. It's a new day!
朝晨.content: 刨子、锯子、针线。新的一天就此开始哩！

信任-朝晨.encontent:
What a pity! No one would live in a dream forever.
 I am willing to pay everything to come back the midsummer
 night.
信任-朝晨.content:
多么可惜啊，没有人可以永远留在梦乡。咱愿意付出一切
回到仲夏夜中。

夜暮.encontent:
Birds have all returned. Only Bottom is still wandering,
 here and there.
夜暮.content: 山林鸟雀都归巢了，只有咱，还在不断地游荡哩。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
What are these? I gathered the rosemary and parsley
 from the forest. I wish there is a chance to send
 them tonight.
信任-夜暮.content:
这是什么？咱从森林之中采来了迷迭香和欧芹。不知今晚
是否有机会送出去。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
I can make costumes. Dukes and ladies, goats and birds,
 everyone needs masks! Do you need it too?
帽檐与发鬓.content:
咱会做戏服。公爵与小姐，山羊与雀鸟，人人都需要头套
的！您也需要吗？

袖与手.encontent:
... What do you want? A table, chair, clothes or a
 statue, I can make it with these hands and give it
 to you.
袖与手.content:
您想要什么？无论是桌子椅子衣服或者是雕像，咱都能够
用这双手做出来送给您。

衣着与身形.encontent:
If I become a complete ass, would that be better than
 now?
衣着与身形.content: 如果变成一只彻头彻尾的驴子，会比现在更好吗？

嗜好.encontent:
Yeah, yeah, I am very grateful for the drama. I will
 play this role until ... until which day?
嗜好.content:
是啊，是啊，咱很感谢戏剧。咱将扮演这个角色直到——直
到哪一天呢？

赞赏.encontent:
You are not frightened by my ass head. You are much
 better than my friends!
赞赏.content: 您居然没被咱的驴头给吓倒，可比咱的伙伴厉害多了！

亲昵.encontent:
Although I'm but a weaver, as long as you want anything,
 I will try my best to find it.
亲昵.content:
虽说咱不过只是一介织工，但您想要的东西，咱都会尽力
帮您寻来的。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
In addition to my job, I'm also good at spinning around.
 Yes, donkey work. I'm best at this kind of useless
 work, just like love.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
除了本职工作之外，咱还擅长转圈。是的，是拉磨练出来
的。咱很擅长这种跟爱情一样的无用功。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
What's in a name? That which we call a rose by any
 other word would smell as sweet.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
名字代表什么？我们所称的玫瑰，换个名字还是一样芳香
。

独白.encontent:
I don't know plays. I'm but a rugged craftsman ...
  But who knows? No one. Each one of us is in the play.
独白.content:
咱不懂戏剧，只是一个粗野的工匠而已——但又有谁懂呢
？没有人，咱们每一个人都在戏剧之中。

入队.encontent:
Cobweb, Peaseblossom, Mustardseed ... Good masters
 are all here.
入队.content: 蛛网、豆花、芥子……好先生们都来了啊。

择选咒语Ⅱ.encontent: Just as easy as dealing with wood and cloth.
择选咒语Ⅱ.content: 就像对付木头和布料一样简单。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: It's a dream I shall never forget.
择选至终的仪式.content: 这是咱不愿意遗忘的梦。

释放神秘术Ⅰ.encontent: Flowers are always fresh and fragrant ...

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: One Two Three. Fall asleep with me.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 一步，两步，三步。与咱一同沉醉梦中。

洞悉.encontent:
Rounds after rounds, the wheat in the mill will be
 crushed in the round. Days after days, she will come
 to me one day.
洞悉.content:
一圈又一圈，总有一圈，磨盘里的小麦会被全部碾碎。一
天又一天，总有一天，她会来找咱的。
